R

RANDOM - Static variable in class gold_miner.GameMaster
Character code specifying that the agent (miner) is nonrational, that its, its actions are randomly decided as long as it does not result in the miner going out of bounds
RandomMiner - Class in gold_miner
Class implementing the nonrational agent whose actions are randomly decided as long as it does not result in the miner going out of bounds
RandomMiner() - Constructor for class gold_miner.RandomMiner
Creates a nonrational agent whose actions are randomly decided as long as it does not result in this miner going out of bounds
randomMove() - Method in class gold_miner.GameMaster
Action corresponding to a move by the nonrational agent
randomRotate() - Method in class gold_miner.GameMaster
Action corresponding to a rotation by the nonrational agent
randomScan() - Method in class gold_miner.GameMaster
Action corresponding to a scan by the nonrational agent
randomStepByStep() - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Controls the processes related to the step-by-step demonstration of the actions of the rational agent
RATIONAL - Static variable in class gold_miner.GameMaster
Character code specifying that the agent (miner) is rational, that is, its actions are deliberated via more sophisticated decision-making processes (explained in the technical report accompanying this program)
rationalStepByStep() - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Controls the processes related to the step-by-step demonstration of the actions of the rational agent
removeUpdate(DocumentEvent) - Method in class controller.InitScreenController
Gives notification that a potion of the document has been removed
RIGHT - Static variable in class gold_miner.Miner
Character code corresponding to a move to the tile to the right of this miner's current position
RIGHT - Static variable in class gold_miner.RandomMiner
Character code corresponding to a move to the tile to the right of this miner's current position
rotate() - Method in class gold_miner.Miner
Action corresponding to a rotation by this rational agent
rotate() - Method in class gold_miner.RandomMiner
Action corresponding to a rotation by this nonrational agent
ROTATE - Static variable in class gold_miner.RandomMiner
Character code corresponding to a rotate by this miner
rotateMiner(int, int, char) - Method in class gui.MainScreen
Updates the display to reflect a (clockwise) rotation by the miner
rotateUntilAllowed(Board) - Method in class gold_miner.Miner
Returns true if this miner can perform a finite series of rotations in order to face a tile that has neither been visited nor scanned; false, otherwise (indicating the need to perform backtracking)
rotateUntilFacing(Square, Square) - Method in class gold_miner.Miner
Performs a series of rotations given the square tile currently occupied by this miner in order to face in the direction of the specified neighboring square tile
